item.title: Summary of Payroll Audit SmartList POW!
item.description:
Last week, I was asked to create a report that summarized payroll amounts and hours by pay code. This report would be used as a final check before printing paychecks, ensuring accuracy after payroll calculation. Using SmartList Builder, we created the report in minutes! Here’s how: Navigate to the SmartList Builder: Microsoft Dynamics GP » Tools » SmartList Builder » SmartList Builder. Input a SmartList ID, Name, and Item Name. Select Product: Microsoft Dynamics GP, Series: Payroll...

item.title: GP Multi-Company SmartLists - Part 1
item.description:
Part 1: Creating Multi-Company SmartLists in Microsoft Dynamics GP 1. Introduction This series will guide you through creating SmartLists that combine data from multiple Dynamics GP companies. We’ll leverage SmartList Builder, custom SQL scripts, and address security considerations. This solution is particularly beneficial for organizations with numerous GP company databases managed centrally, such as Consolidated Property Corporation in our example.
